data.DescriptionHtml:
With a successful melee touch attack, you infest a target with maggotlike creatures.
They deal 1d4 points of temporary Constitution damage each round.
The subject makes a new Fortitude save each round.
The spell ends if the target succeeds at its saving throw.
The infestation can be removed with a cure disease or heal spell.
Material Component: A handful of dead, dried flies.
data.Name: Infestation of Maggots
